scripts.bench: npm run bench:serve & npm run bench:watch
scripts.docs: npm run docs:serve & npm run docs:watch
scripts.docs:win: start npm run docs:serve && npm run docs:watch
scripts.bench:watch: nodemon --ext elm --exec "cd perf && elm make Benchmark/Main.elm --output=benchmark.html"
scripts.docs:watch: nodemon --ext elm --exec "cd docs && elm make src/Main.elm --output=dist/main.js"
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && time (elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=dist/main.temp.js && google-closure-compiler --js dist/main.temp.js --js_output_file dist/main.js) && stat -f 'size    %z bytes' dist/main.js && rm dist/main.temp.js
